@Validated

extends Object

      • getUniqueAttributes

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Serializable> getUniqueAttributes​(@PathVariable("appId")
                                                                                 Long appId,
                                                                                 @PathVariable("appLayerId")
                                                                                 Long appLayerId,
                                                                                 @PathVariable("attributeName")
                                                                                 String attributeName,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 String filter)
                                                                          throws BadRequestException
        Get a list of unique attribute values for a given attribute name.
        Parameters:
        appId - the application
        appLayerId - the application layer id
        attributeName - the attribute name
        filter - A filter that was already applied to the layer (on a different attribute or this attribute)
        Returns:
        a list of unique values, can be empty
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the request was invalid, eg. the provided filter could not be parsed
